mapper.select: SELECT sysdate()
SELECT jenis FROM mst_master WHERE id = 0

SELECT child.parent, parent.nama parent_nama, parent.link parent_link, child.id, child.nama, child.link, child.urut, case when akses.active is null then 0 else akses.active end active FROM lst_menu child INNER JOIN lst_menu parent ON child.parent = parent.id LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT * FROM lst_group_user g, lst_hak_akses h WHERE g.id = h.group_user_id AND g.id = #{group_user_id}) akses ON child.id = akses.menu_id WHERE child.active = 1 ORDER BY child.parent, child.urut;

SELECT count(*) FROM lst_user
WHERE UPPER(username) LIKE CONCAT('%', UPPER(TRIM(#{search})), '%')

SELECT count(*) FROM lst_group_user
WHERE UPPER(nama) LIKE CONCAT('%', UPPER(TRIM(#{search})), '%')

SELECT akses.group_user_id, m.id menu_id, m.nama, IFNULL(akses.active, 0) active, m.urut, m.parent, parent.nama parent_nama FROM lst_menu m INNER JOIN lst_menu parent ON m.parent = parent.id LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT * FROM lst_group_user g, lst_hak_akses h WHERE g.id = h.group_user_id AND g.id = #{id}) akses ON m.id = akses.menu_id WHERE m.parent > 1 ORDER BY m.parent, m.urut

SELECT s.*, c.username createuser, m.username modifyuser FROM lst_supir s LEFT OUTER JOIN lst_user c ON s.createby = c.id LEFT OUTER JOIN lst_user m ON s.modifyby = m.id
WHERE s.id = #{id}

SELECT count(*) FROM lst_supir s
WHERE (s.id LIKE CONCAT('%', UPPER(TRIM(#{search})), '%') OR s.nama LIKE CONCAT('%', UPPER(TRIM(#{search})), '%') )
SELECT count(*) FROM lst_supir s WHERE UPPER(s.nama) = UPPER(TRIM(#{search}))

SELECT a.*, a.nama value FROM mst_customer a
WHERE UPPER(a.nama) LIKE CONCAT('%', UPPER(TRIM(#{search})), '%')
ORDER BY a.nama
LIMIT #{offset}, #{rowcount}

SELECT a.*, a.nama value FROM mst_customer a WHERE UPPER(a.nama) LIKE CONCAT('%', UPPER(TRIM(#{search})), '%') AND a.type=0 ORDER BY a.nama
LIMIT #{offset}, #{rowcount}

SELECT a.*, a.nama value FROM mst_customer a WHERE UPPER(a.nama) LIKE CONCAT('%', UPPER(TRIM(#{search})), '%') AND a.type=1 ORDER BY a.nama
LIMIT #{offset}, #{rowcount}

SELECT count(*) FROM mst_customer
WHERE UPPER(nama) LIKE CONCAT('%', UPPER(TRIM(#{search})), '%')

SELECT b.*, c.username createuser, m.username modifyuser FROM lst_barang b LEFT OUTER JOIN lst_user c ON b.createby = c.id LEFT OUTER JOIN lst_user m ON b.modifyby = m.id
WHERE b.id = #{id}

SELECT count(*) FROM lst_barang b
WHERE (b.id LIKE CONCAT('%', UPPER(TRIM(#{search})), '%') OR UPPER(b.nama) LIKE CONCAT('%', UPPER(TRIM(#{search})), '%') )
SELECT count(*) FROM lst_barang b WHERE UPPER(b.nama) = UPPER(TRIM(#{search}))

SELECT s.*, c.username createuser, m.username modifyuser, k.keterangan jenisName FROM lst_mobil s LEFT OUTER JOIN lst_user c ON s.createby = c.id LEFT OUTER JOIN lst_user m ON s.modifyby = m.id LEFT OUTER JOIN lst_config k ON s.jenis = k.jenis AND k.id = 4
WHERE UPPER(s.no_polisi) = UPPER(#{no_polisi})

SELECT count(*) FROM lst_mobil s
WHERE (UPPER(s.no_polisi) LIKE CONCAT('%', UPPER(#{search}), '%') )
SELECT count(*) FROM lst_mobil s WHERE UPPER(s.no_polisi) = UPPER(TRIM(#{search}))

SELECT s.*, c.username createuser, m.username modifyuser, k.keterangan jenisName FROM lst_kapal s LEFT OUTER JOIN lst_user c ON s.createby = c.id LEFT OUTER JOIN lst_user m ON s.modifyby = m.id LEFT OUTER JOIN lst_config k ON s.jenis = k.jenis AND k.id = 5
WHERE UPPER(s.kode) = UPPER(#{kode})

SELECT count(*) FROM lst_kapal s
WHERE (UPPER(s.kode) LIKE CONCAT('%', UPPER(#{search}), '%') OR UPPER(s.nama) LIKE CONCAT('%', UPPER(#{search}), '%') )
SELECT count(*) FROM lst_kapal s WHERE UPPER(s.kode) = UPPER(TRIM(#{search}))

SELECT s.*, c.username createuser, m.username modifyuser, x.nama customerName, y.nama barangName FROM lst_harga s LEFT OUTER JOIN lst_user c ON s.createby = c.id LEFT OUTER JOIN lst_user m ON s.modifyby = m.id LEFT OUTER JOIN mst_customer x ON s.customer_id = x.id LEFT OUTER JOIN lst_barang y ON s.barang_id = y.id WHERE 1 = 1
AND UPPER(s.customer_id) = UPPER(#{customer_id})
AND UPPER(s.barang_id) = UPPER(#{barang_id})

SELECT count(*) FROM lst_harga s LEFT OUTER JOIN mst_customer x ON s.customer_id = x.id LEFT OUTER JOIN lst_barang y ON s.barang_id = y.id
WHERE (UPPER(x.nama) LIKE CONCAT('%', UPPER(TRIM(#{search})), '%') OR UPPER(y.nama) LIKE CONCAT('%', UPPER(TRIM(#{search})), '%') )
SELECT count(*) FROM lst_harga s WHERE (UPPER(s.customer_id) LIKE CONCAT('%', UPPER(TRIM(#{customer_id})), '%') AND UPPER(s.barang_id) LIKE CONCAT('%', UPPER(TRIM(#{barang_id})), '%') )

SELECT b.*, c.username createuser, m.username modifyuser FROM lst_cabang b LEFT OUTER JOIN lst_user c ON b.createby = c.id LEFT OUTER JOIN lst_user m ON b.modifyby = m.id
WHERE b.id = #{id}

SELECT count(*) FROM lst_cabang b
WHERE (b.id LIKE CONCAT('%', UPPER(TRIM(#{search})), '%') OR UPPER(b.kode) LIKE CONCAT('%', UPPER(TRIM(#{search})), '%') OR UPPER(b.nama) LIKE CONCAT('%', UPPER(TRIM(#{search})), '%') )
SELECT count(*) FROM lst_cabang b WHERE UPPER(b.kode) = UPPER(TRIM(#{search}))

SELECT t.*, cr.username createuser, mo.username modifyuser, ca.username canceluser, ifnull((SELECT max(urut) FROM mst_trans_det WHERE trans_id = t.id), 0) urut, c1.nama customer, c2.nama tujuan FROM mst_trans t LEFT OUTER JOIN lst_user cr ON t.createby = cr.id LEFT OUTER JOIN lst_user mo ON t.modifyby = mo.id LEFT OUTER JOIN lst_user ca ON t.cancelby = ca.id LEFT OUTER JOIN mst_customer c1 ON t.customer_id = c1.id LEFT OUTER JOIN mst_customer c2 ON t.tujuan_id = c2.id WHERE t.id = #{id}

SELECT b.id "key", b.nama "value", IFNULL(h.harga, 0) "desc" FROM lst_barang b LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT * FROM lst_harga WHERE customer_id = #{customer_id} AND active = 1) h ON b.id = h.barang_id WHERE UPPER(b.nama) LIKE CONCAT('%', UPPER(TRIM(#{nama})), '%') AND b.active = 1
SELECT id FROM lst_barang WHERE UPPER(TRIM(nama)) = UPPER(TRIM(#{value}))
SELECT no_stt FROM mst_trans WHERE id = #{value}

SELECT d.*, cr.username createuser, mo.username modifyuser, ca.username canceluser, s.nama supir_nama, concat('[', kode, '] ', k.nama) kapal_nama FROM mst_delivery d LEFT OUTER JOIN lst_user cr ON d.createby = cr.id LEFT OUTER JOIN lst_user mo ON d.modifyby = mo.id LEFT OUTER JOIN lst_user ca ON d.cancelby = ca.id LEFT OUTER JOIN lst_supir s ON d.supir_id = s.id LEFT OUTER JOIN lst_kapal k ON d.kode_kapal = k.kode WHERE d.id = #{id}

SELECT d.*, t.no_stt, c.nama customer_nama, td.colly, td.nama_barang FROM mst_delivery_det d, mst_trans_det td, mst_trans t, mst_customer c WHERE d.delivery_id = #{delivery_id} AND d.trans_id = td.trans_id AND d.trans_urut = td.urut AND td.trans_id = t.id AND t.customer_id = c.id ORDER BY c.nama, td.nama_barang

SELECT t.no_stt, t.customer_id, t.colly colly_stt, c.nama customer, td.trans_id, td.urut, td.barang_id, td.nama_barang, td.colly, td.colly_remain, concat('[', t.no_stt, ' | ', c.nama, ' | ', t.colly, '] ', td.nama_barang, ' (', FORMAT(td.colly, 0), '/', FORMAT(td.colly_remain, 0), ')') value FROM mst_trans t, mst_customer c, mst_trans_det td WHERE t.cancel = 0 AND t.tujuan_id = c.id AND t.id = td.trans_id AND td.colly_remain > 0 AND t.no_stt LIKE CONCAT('%', UPPER(TRIM(#{value})), '%') ORDER BY t.no_stt, td.trans_id, td.urut

SELECT b.*, c.username createuser, m.username modifyuser FROM lst_biaya b LEFT OUTER JOIN lst_user c ON b.createby = c.id LEFT OUTER JOIN lst_user m ON b.modifyby = m.id
WHERE b.id = #{id}

SELECT count(*) FROM lst_biaya b
WHERE (b.id LIKE CONCAT('%', UPPER(TRIM(#{search})), '%') OR UPPER(b.nama) LIKE CONCAT('%', UPPER(TRIM(#{search})), '%') )
SELECT count(*) FROM lst_biaya b WHERE UPPER(b.nama) = UPPER(TRIM(#{search}))
SELECT b.id, b.nama, b.nominal, b.nama value FROM lst_biaya b WHERE active = 1 AND UPPER(b.nama) LIKE CONCAT('%', UPPER(TRIM(#{value})), '%') ORDER BY b.nama
SELECT c.*, b.nama nama_biaya FROM mst_delivery_cost c, lst_biaya b WHERE c.delivery_id = #{delivery_id} AND c.biaya_id = b.id ORDER BY b.nama
SELECT IFNULL(colly, 0) FROM mst_trans_det WHERE trans_id = #{trans_id} AND urut = #{trans_urut}

SELECT p.*, cr.username createuser, mo.username modifyuser, ca.username canceluser, t.no_stt, c.nama customer, c2.nama tujuan FROM mst_payment p LEFT OUTER JOIN lst_user cr ON p.createby = cr.id LEFT OUTER JOIN lst_user mo ON p.modifyby = mo.id LEFT OUTER JOIN lst_user ca ON p.cancelby = ca.id LEFT OUTER JOIN mst_trans t ON p.trans_id = t.id LEFT OUTER JOIN mst_customer c ON t.customer_id = c.id LEFT OUTER JOIN mst_customer c2 ON t.tujuan_id = c2.id WHERE p.payment_id = #{payment_id}

SELECT t.id, t.no_stt, t.tgl_stt, c.nama customer, t.pay_mode, t.remain, d.nama tujuan, concat('[', t.no_stt, ' | ', date_format(t.tgl_stt, '%d/%m'), ' ] ', c.nama, ' - ', IFNULL(d.nama, ''), ' (', FORMAT(t.remain, 0), ' / ', FORMAT(t.total_harga-t.potongan, 0), ')') value FROM mst_trans t INNER JOIN mst_customer c ON t.customer_id = c.id LEFT OUTER JOIN mst_customer d ON t.tujuan_id = d.id WHERE t.cancel = 0 AND t.no_stt LIKE CONCAT('%', UPPER(TRIM(#{value})), '%')

SELECT ifnull( total_harga - potongan - (SELECT ifnull(sum(nominal * (case when upper(p.dk) = 'D' then 1 when upper(p.dk) = 'K' then -1 end)), 0) FROM mst_payment p WHERE trans_id = t.id AND cancel = 0) , 0) FROM mst_trans t WHERE t.id = #{value}

SELECT count(*) FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT CASE WHEN (tr.cabang_id = tr.pay_mode) or tr.pay_mode = 0 THEN c.id ELSE c2.id END id, CASE WHEN (tr.cabang_id = tr.pay_mode) or tr.pay_mode = 0 THEN c.nama ELSE c2.nama END nama, CASE WHEN (tr.cabang_id = tr.pay_mode) or tr.pay_mode = 0 THEN c.limit_hutang ELSE c2.limit_hutang END limit_hutang, SUM(tr.total_harga) total_harga, SUM(tr.potongan) potongan, SUM(tr.remain) remain, MIN(tgl_stt) since FROM mst_trans tr LEFT JOIN mst_customer c ON c.id = tr.customer_id LEFT JOIN mst_customer c2 ON c2.id = tr.tujuan_id WHERE IFNULL(tr.cancel, 0) = 0 AND tr.remain > 0 AND tr.customer_id = c.id
AND ( UPPER(CASE WHEN (tr.cabang_id = tr.pay_mode) or tr.pay_mode = 0 THEN c.nama ELSE c2.nama END) LIKE CONCAT('%', UPPER(TRIM(#{search})), '%') )
GROUP BY CASE WHEN (tr.cabang_id = tr.pay_mode) or tr.pay_mode = 0 THEN c.id ELSE c2.id END, CASE WHEN (tr.cabang_id = tr.pay_mode) or tr.pay_mode = 0 THEN c.nama ELSE c2.nama END, CASE WHEN (tr.cabang_id = tr.pay_mode) or tr.pay_mode = 0 THEN c.limit_hutang ELSE c2.limit_hutang END ) a

SELECT (case when (SUM(t.remain) >= c.limit_hutang) AND IFNULL(c.limit_hutang, 0) > 0 then 1 else 0 end) lewat FROM mst_trans t LEFT JOIN mst_customer c ON t.customer_id = c.id LEFT JOIN mst_customer c2 ON t.tujuan_id = c2.id WHERE IFNULL(t.cancel, 0) = 0 AND t.remain > 0 AND (CASE WHEN (t.cabang_id = t.pay_mode) or t.pay_mode = 0 THEN t.customer_id ELSE t.tujuan_id END) = #{value}
SELECT count(*) FROM mst_delivery d, mst_delivery_det dd WHERE d.id = dd.delivery_id AND d.cancel = 0 AND dd.trans_id = #{value}
SELECT count(*) FROM mst_delivery d, mst_delivery_det dd WHERE d.id = dd.delivery_id AND d.cancel = 0 AND dd.trans_id = #{trans_id} AND dd.trans_urut = #{urut}
